item.title: FinMacAdmin 12.12.2017
item.description: FinMacAdmin 2017 pt.2 - First time second time in a calendar year! Second event of the year takes place in downtown Helsinki, with topics ranging from WiFi to Swift. We will also hear about new things happening in Apple ecosystem - and of course, meet colleagues! Attending: We are sold out. However, you can follow the registration page at https://www.regonline.com/FI_EMEIA_TP_ENT_171212_2091372 for cancellations. Venue: The event will be held in the World Trade Center Helsinki.

item.title: About the MacAdminFi organization
item.description: MacAdminFi is an organization of Finnish Mac Admininistrators. Our aim is to provide information and (moral) support, and organize events, revolving around the Apple ecosystems. We have no official structure, membership or affiliation with any instances. Individually, we exist in Finnish organisations and companies, taking care of Macs and their users. Collectively, we (sometimes) exist on the #finland MacAdmins Slack channel, taking care of each other. Every so often, we have an actual gathering, a mini-conference of sorts.

item.title: FinMacAdmin 20.1.2017
item.description: After a short hiatus, FinMacAdmin is back again - bigger and better than ever! This year, the organizers will bring you our first ever guests from outside Finnish borders as Henry Stamerjohann (Slack:@henry) from Apfelwerk and Viktor Glemme (Slack:@glemme) from JAMF will be presenting at the event. Henry and Viktor will be joined on stage by the household names, such as Hannes Juutilainen (Slack:@hjuutilainen) and Janne Lehikoinen (Slack:@fatmrcrab).

item.title: Finnish Mac Admin Community site
item.description: Hello Suomalaiset people and others too! Welcome to the new and first home of the Finnish Mac Admin community. These webpages will host information about coming events and occasionally a blog post or two. The best thing is that anybody can take part and contribute - our source code is open on GitHub. Our small community has been growing rapidly during the past year - so at least for us, 2016 was not that bad afterall.

item.title: Contact
item.description: The easiest (and currently the only) way to contact MacAdminFi community is to join the MacAdmins Slack and join the #Finland channel.
